text: charlie_pace Anything ?
dr_jack_shephard You keep asking if there 's anything .

charlie_pace Pardon me for appearing desperate , but before the pilot was ripped from the cockpit , he did say that no - one 's going to find us unless we … get that transceiver working . So ... is there anything ?
dr_jack_shephard No .
charlie_pace Okay .
kate_austen What were you doing ? In the bathroom ?
charlie_pace I thought you could tell . I was getting sick . Puking . My one tangible contribution to the trek .
kate_austen No . I 'm glad you came . Charlie .
charlie_pace Every trek needs a coward .
kate_austen You 're not a coward .
cindy_chandler You all right , sir ?
charlie_pace I 'm good . Thanks .
cindy_chandler Can I get you a water , or … .
charlie_pace I 'm fine . Thank you . Please ?
cindy_chandler All right .
charlie_pace Excuse me .
rose_nadler Guess he really had to go .
cindy_chandler Sir , excuse me ! Sir , excuse me !
shannon_rutherford Excuse me ?
cindy_chandler Ladies and gentlemen , the Captain has turned on the """" fasten seatbelt """" sign . Please return to your seats and fasten your seatbelts .
JD Sir , are you all right ?
charlie_pace Just a minute . Just a minute .
JD I 'm gon na have to ask that you open the door , please .
JD Open the door now , sir . Sir !
boone_carlyle Hey . We 're going through some clothes . Sorting them . I see you found your bag . Come on , you want to give us a hand ?
shannon_rutherford Not really . You 're wasting your time . They 're coming .
claire_littleton Is that your boyfriend ?
shannon_rutherford My brother . Boone . God 's friggin ' gift to humanity .
claire_littleton I used to have a stomach .
shannon_rutherford You know what it is ?
claire_littleton Not yet . I have n't felt the baby move since yesterday .
michael_dawson Uh , excuse me . Hey , uh … have you , uh ... have you seen my boy ?
sunhwa_kwon 죄송해요. 저 영어 못 해요. 아 … 저 , 제가 영어를 못 해요.
jinsoo_kwon 윗 단추가 열렸네. 채워라. 빨리 !
michael_dawson I 'm sorry . Walt ! Walt ?
walt_lloyd Vincent ! Vincent ! Come here , boy !
michael_dawson Hey ! What did I tell you ? After everything that 's happened !
walt_lloyd I thought that maybe Vincent would be around !
michael_dawson I told you to stay on the beach !
walt_lloyd This is so close to the beach , I thought this would be okay … .
michael_dawson Do n't do that . You listen to me . I mean what I say . You understand ?
michael_dawson What is this ?
walt_lloyd I just found it .
michael_dawson Come here .
michael_dawson Hey guys . Come on , man . Hey .
dr_jack_shephard Hey . Break it up . Break it up ! Come on ! That 's it ! It 's over ! That 's it !
james_ford Son of a bitch !
sayid_jarrah I 'm sick of this redneck !
james_ford You want some more of me , boy ?
sayid_jarrah Tell everyone what you told me ! Tell them that I crashed the plane ! Go on ! Tell them I made the plane crash !
james_ford The shoe fits , buddy !
dr_jack_shephard What is going on ?
sayid_jarrah Ibn Al - Kalb !
dr_jack_shephard What 's going on ?
michael_dawson Look , my kid found these in the jungle .
james_ford And this guy was sitting in the back row of business class , the whole flight , never got up . Hands folded underneath the blanket .
sayid_jarrah Oh .
james_ford And for some reason - just pointin ' this out - the guy sittin ' next to him did n't make it .
sayid_jarrah Thank you so much for observing my behavior .
james_ford You do n't think I saw them pull you out of line before we boarded ?
james_ford Come on , bring it !
kate_austen Stop !
kate_austen We found the transceiver , but it 's not working . Can anybody help ?
sayid_jarrah Yes . I might be able to .
james_ford Oh great . Perfect ! Let 's trust this guy !
hugo_reyes Hey ! We 're all this together , man . Let 's treat each other with a little respect .
james_ford Shut up , Lardo .
dr_jack_shephard Hey ! Give it a break .
james_ford Whatever you say , doc . You 're the hero .
boone_carlyle You guys found the cockpit ? Any survivors ?
dr_jack_shephard No .
sayid_jarrah It 's dual band , military spec . Chances are , the battery is good , but - the radio is dead .
kate_austen Can you fix it ?
sayid_jarrah I need some time .
rose_nadler Doctor , the ... man with the shrapnel , I ... I think you should take a look at him .
hugo_reyes Tsss . Chain - smoking jackass ... .
sayid_jarrah Some people have problems .
hugo_reyes Tsss . Some people have problems ? Us . Him . You 're okay . I like you .
sayid_jarrah You 're okay , too .
hugo_reyes Hurley . Uh , just … .
sayid_jarrah Sayid .
hugo_reyes How do you know to do all that ?
sayid_jarrah I was a military communications officer .
hugo_reyes Oh yeah ? You ever see battle ?
sayid_jarrah I fought in the Gulf War .
hugo_reyes No way ! I got a buddy who fought over there . He was in the 104th airborne . What were you - Air Force ... Army ?
sayid_jarrah The Republican Guard .
sunhwa_kwon 실례합니다. 준비 다 됐나 봐요. 당신을 찾아요.
kate_austen Is it working ?
sayid_jarrah Seems to be . Except we 're not picking up a signal .
kate_austen Why do we need to pick up a signal ? Are n't we trying to send one ?
sayid_jarrah Yes , but what you want to see here is little bars . The bars would show the radio is getting reception .
kate_austen We need the bars .

sayid_jarrah We could broadcast blind ... . Hope that someone — maybe a ship somewhere — picks up our distress call . But that could be a waste of the battery , which might not last that long . There is one thing we could try ... .
kate_austen What ?
sayid_jarrah Seeing if we can get a signal from high ground .
kate_austen How high ?
kate_austen How is he ? Can you do anything ?
dr_jack_shephard Pull out the shrapnel .
kate_austen But you said yesterday that if you took it out ... .

dr_jack_shephard I know . But that was yesterday . I was hoping he 'd be at a hospital by now . If I leave him like this , he 'll be dead within a day . If I open him up ... if I can control the bleeding and if he does n't go into sepsis and if I can find some antibiotics ... he might be all right .
kate_austen I 'm going on a hike .
dr_jack_shephard Sorry ?
kate_austen Sayid fixed the transceiver , but we ca n't use it . Not from here .
dr_jack_shephard Kate , wait a minute .
kate_austen You 're the one who said that we had to send out a signal .
dr_jack_shephard Look , you saw what that thing did to the pilot .
kate_austen Yeah , I did . What makes you think we 're any safer here than we are in the jungle ?
dr_jack_shephard Wait for me . I do n't know how long this will be ... .
kate_austen Sayid said the batteries wo n't last .
dr_jack_shephard All right . If you see , or hear , anything ... Anything . Run .
hugo_reyes What 's that ? What , that ? What , eat that ? Dude . Dude . I 'm ... starving ... But , I 'm nowhere near that hungry . No . No . No , thank you ! No way , no .
michael_dawson The comic 's in Spanish . You ... read Spanish ?
walt_lloyd No . I found it .
michael_dawson Tell you what We get home ... I get you another dog .
dr_jack_shephard Hey ! I need your help .
hugo_reyes Okay .
dr_jack_shephard I need you to help me go through the luggage . I need any kind of prescription medications you can find . Especially drugs that end in -mycin and -cillin . Those are antibiotics .
hugo_reyes What 's this for ?
boone_carlyle What are you doing ?
shannon_rutherford I think I was mean to him .
boone_carlyle What ?
shannon_rutherford Is n't that the guy from the gate ? He would n't let us have our seats in first class . He saved our lives .
boone_carlyle Come on , Shannon , we 're trying to clear some of the wreckage . You should help out . You 're just being worthless over here .
shannon_rutherford I 'm being what ?
boone_carlyle What do you want me to say ? You 're sitting on your ass staring at bodies .
shannon_rutherford I 've just been through a trauma here , okay ?
boone_carlyle We 've all been through a trauma . The only difference is , since the crash , you 've actually given yourself a pedicure .
shannon_rutherford You know what ? It is so easy to make fun of me , and you 're good at it . I get it .
boone_carlyle I wish I did n't have to waste my time making fun of you . I wish I did n't have a reason . Yeah , it is easy , Shannon .
shannon_rutherford Screw you , you do not have the slightest idea what I am thinking .
boone_carlyle I have a much better idea than you think I do .
shannon_rutherford No , you do n't !
boone_carlyle Okay , Shannon . Then what are you thinking ?
shannon_rutherford I 'm going with them . On the hike .
boone_carlyle Yeah ?
shannon_rutherford Yup . I 'm going .
boone_carlyle No , you 're not , Shannon . Shannon !
shannon_rutherford I 'd like to come with you .
boone_carlyle She 's not going . She does n't want to go .
shannon_rutherford The hell I 'm not .
boone_carlyle It 's what she does . She postures .
shannon_rutherford You do n't know what the hell I do !
boone_carlyle Makes really bad decisions to upset her family , which , at the moment , is me .
shannon_rutherford Shut up , and stop trying to be charming . I 'm coming with you .
kate_austen I do n't ... know if that 's such a good idea .
shannon_rutherford What are you ? Two years older than me ? Please . You 're going , are n't you ?
charlie_pace Yeah , are you ?
shannon_rutherford Yup .
charlie_pace Yeah , I 'm definitely going .
kate_austen Look , everybody can come . But we 're leaving now .
charlie_pace You could n't tell from that , but she 's actually really nice .
kate_austen You decided to join us .
james_ford I 'm a complex guy , sweetheart .
michael_dawson What you 're looking for ?
dr_jack_shephard Some sort of blade . How 's your son ?
michael_dawson Walt ? Yeah , I think he 'll be all right .
dr_jack_shephard How old is he ?
michael_dawson Nine ... Ten — Ten . Walt 's more worried about his dog than anything . The dog was on the plane , so ... Kids , you know .
dr_jack_shephard Is it a Lab ?
michael_dawson Yeah .
dr_jack_shephard Yeah ? I saw him yesterday , in the jungle .
michael_dawson What ? Where ?
dr_jack_shephard Over there . Couple hundred yards in or so . He looked good .
walt_lloyd What is it , like checkers ?
john_locke Not really , it 's a better game than ... checkers . You play checkers with your Pop ?
walt_lloyd No . I live in Australia with my mom .
john_locke You have no accent .
walt_lloyd Yeah , I know . We move a lot . She got sick . She died a couple of weeks ago .
john_locke You 're having a bad month .
walt_lloyd I guess .
john_locke Backgammon is the oldest game in the world . Archeologists found sets when they excavated the ruins of ancient Mesopotamia . Five thousand years old . That 's older than Jesus Christ .
walt_lloyd Did they have dice and stuff ?
john_locke Mhhm . But theirs were n't made of plastic . Their dice were made of bones .
walt_lloyd Cool .
john_locke Two players . Two sides . One is light ... one is dark . Walt , do you want to know a secret ?
claire_littleton No . Tha- thank you . No , it 's okay . No , really . Okay . Thanks .

claire_littleton Oh , gosh . I just felt it . I ju … Come here , feel this . Please . . Please . Please . Do you feel that ? There ! Right there , that 's a kick ! There ! There , right there 's a foot ! Oh no , he 's , wait , he 's moving around . """" He """" . """" He """" . I guess I think you 're a """" he """" .
james_ford Okay ! Wide open space ! You should check the radio , see if we 're good .
sayid_jarrah We 're not going to have any reception here .
james_ford Just try it .
sayid_jarrah I do n't want to waste the batteries .
james_ford I 'm not asking you to keep it on all day .
sayid_jarrah We 're still blocked by the mountain .
james_ford Just check the damn radio !
sayid_jarrah If I just check .. we might not have any juice left when we get to ... .
shannon_rutherford My god .
boone_carlyle What the hell 's that ?
kate_austen Something 's coming .
charlie_pace It 's coming towards us , I think .
kate_austen Come on , let 's move .
shannon_rutherford I should n't have come . Aah !
sayid_jarrah Go ! Go !
kate_austen Sawyer !
sayid_jarrah Let him go !
shannon_rutherford That 's ... that 's a big bear .
boone_carlyle You think that 's what killed the pilot ?
charlie_pace No . No , that 's a tiny , teeny version compared to that .
kate_austen Guys , this is n't just a ... bear . That 's a polar bear .
hugo_reyes You sure he 's out ?
dr_jack_shephard He 's out .
hugo_reyes How do you know he wo n't wake up when you yank that thing out ?
dr_jack_shephard I do n't .
hugo_reyes Hey , guy , are you awake ? Yo , there 's a rescue plane ! We 're saved ! Yaaay ! Yeah , he 's out . So — what do you want me ... .
dr_jack_shephard Look , it 's unlikely that he 'll regain consciousness . But the pain might bring him around . And if it does , I need you to hold him down .
hugo_reyes Uh ... I 'm not so good around blood , man .
dr_jack_shephard Then do n't look .
hugo_reyes Yeah . But .. I 'm not so good around blood .
dr_jack_shephard Just do the best you can . Okay ? Do n't look .
hugo_reyes Okay .
hugo_reyes Dude .
dr_jack_shephard Hand me those strips .
hugo_reyes Dude .
dr_jack_shephard Just hand me the strips , I need to get this bleeding stopped .
hugo_reyes I do n't think I can .
dr_jack_shephard Oh .
"hugo_reyes """ Oh """" what ? What , what 's going on , something in there ?
dr_jack_shephard The strips . Just hand me the strips . Give it to me . Do n't even think about it , Hurley . Do n't even think a ... Hurley ! Hey ! Damn it !
boone_carlyle That ca n't be a polar bear .
sayid_jarrah and KATE It 's a polar bear .
shannon_rutherford Yeah , but ... Polar bears do n't usually live in the jungle .
charlie_pace Spot on .
sayid_jarrah No , polar bears do n't live near this far south .
boone_carlyle This one does .
james_ford Did . It did .
kate_austen Where did that come from ?
james_ford Probably Bear Village . How the hell do I know ?
kate_austen Not the bear . The gun .
james_ford I got if off one of the bodies .
sayid_jarrah One of the bodies .
james_ford Yeah , one of the bodies .
shannon_rutherford People do n't carry guns on planes .
james_ford They do if they 're a US Marshal , sweet cheeks . There was one on the plane .
kate_austen How do you know that ?
james_ford I saw a guy lying there with an ankle holster , so I took the gun . I thought it might come in handy . Guess what ? I just shot a bear !
kate_austen So why do you think he 's a Marshal ?
james_ford Because he had a clip - on badge . I took that too . Thought it was cool .
sayid_jarrah I know who you are . You 're the prisoner .
james_ford I 'm the what ?

sayid_jarrah You found a gun on a US Marshal . Yes , I believe you did . You knew where it was , because you were the one he was bringing back to the States . Those handcuffs were on you . That 's how you knew there was a gun .
james_ford Piss off .
sayid_jarrah That 's who you are , you son of a bitch .
james_ford Be as suspicious of me as I am of you .
sayid_jarrah But you are the prisoner .
james_ford Fine ! I 'm the criminal . You 're the terrorist . We can all play a part . Who do you want to be ?
kate_austen Does anybody know how to use a gun ?
charlie_pace I think you just pull the trigger .
sayid_jarrah Do n't use the gun .
kate_austen I want to take it apart .
charlie_pace Oh .
sayid_jarrah There 's a button on the grip . Push that , it will eject the magazine . There 's still a round in the chamber . Hold the grip , pull the top part of the gun .
james_ford I know your type .
kate_austen I 'm not so sure .
james_ford Yeah . I 've been with girls like you .
kate_austen No girl 's exactly like me .
MICHELLE Can I get you a refill ?
kate_austen No , I 'm ... I 'm fine with this , thank you .
MICHELLE You , sir ? Can I get you anything ? Cocktail ? Soda ?
marshal_edward_mars Just coffee , sweetheart . Black .
MICHELLE Coffee . Sure .

marshal_edward_mars You look worried . I 'd be worried too , I was you . But you 've got to stay positive , kiddo . You know , there 's always that off chance that they 'll believe your story . I know I sure do .
kate_austen I do n't care what you believe .
marshal_edward_mars Oh , I know . That 's true . That has always been true . You sure you do n't want some more juice ?
kate_austen Yeah , I 'm sure .
cindy_chandler Ladies and gentlemen , the Captain has switched on the """" fasten seatbelt """" sign . Please return to your seats and fasten your seatbelts .
kate_austen I have one favor to ask .
marshal_edward_mars Really ? This ought to be good . What ... .

[ The turbulence causes the big drop with a woman hitting the ceiling . A big black / silver case hits the Marshal on the head . He passes out . The masks come down and Kate ca n't reach because of the handcuffs . She gets the key from the Marshal 's pocket and unlocks the handcuffs . She puts her mask on and then puts a mask on the Marshal . The back of the plane rips off .
sayid_jarrah We should keep moving .
dr_jack_shephard No . No .
marshal_edward_mars Where is she ?
dr_jack_shephard Who ?
james_ford Oh ! Now 's a good time to check the radio ! Not before .. but now !
sayid_jarrah We 're up higher .
james_ford Yes , we are !
sayid_jarrah Bar . Hey ! We 've got a bar ! Mayday ! Mayday !
kate_austen What is that ?
sayid_jarrah Feedback .
kate_austen Feedback from what ? What would do that ?
sayid_jarrah I do n't know .
james_ford I 'll tell you what would do that . This guy not fixing the radio . This thing does n't even work .
sayid_jarrah No . No , no , no , no , it 's not broken . We ca n't transmit because something else is already transmitting .
charlie_pace Transmitting from where ?
shannon_rutherford What ?
sayid_jarrah Somewhere close . The signal 's strong .
charlie_pace Somewhere close ? You mean on the Island ? That 's great !
boone_carlyle Maybe it 's other survivors .
shannon_rutherford From our plane ? How would they even—.
james_ford What kind of transmission is it ?
sayid_jarrah Could be a sat phone , maybe a radio signal ... .
kate_austen Can we listen to it ?
sayid_jarrah Let me get the frequency first . Hold on .
james_ford There 's no transmission .
kate_austen Shut up .
charlie_pace The rescue party . It has to be . . It 's French ! The French are coming ! I 've never been so happy to hear the French !
kate_austen I never took French . What does she say ?
sayid_jarrah D - Does anybody speak French ?
boone_carlyle She does .
shannon_rutherford No , I do n't . What ?
boone_carlyle What the hell are you talking about ? You spent a year in Paris !
shannon_rutherford Drinking , not studying !
RADIO Iteration 7294531 .
charlie_pace Okay . What 's that ?
sayid_jarrah Oh , no , no , no , no , no , no , no , no , no , no .
"kate_austen """ No , no , no """" what ?
shannon_rutherford What """" no """" ?
sayid_jarrah The - the batteries are dying !
kate_austen How much time do we have ?
sayid_jarrah Not much .
boone_carlyle I 've heard you speak French ! Just listen to this ! Listen to it !
shannon_rutherford I ca n't !
james_ford You speak French or not ? Because that would be nice .
RADIO Iteration 17294532 .
charlie_pace That voice is weird . What is that ?
boone_carlyle Come on . Come on , Shannon !
kate_austen Come on !
sayid_jarrah Come on !
shannon_rutherford It 's ... it 's repeating .
sayid_jarrah She 's right .
boone_carlyle What ?
sayid_jarrah It 's a loop . """" "Iteration""—it" 's repeating the same message . It 's a counter . The next number will end ... """" 533 """" .
RADIO Iteration 17294533 .
james_ford Does anyone know what the hell he 's talking about ?
sayid_jarrah It 's a running count of the number of times the message has repeated . It 's roughly thirty seconds long , so ... how long ... .
james_ford Do n't forget to carry the one , chief .
RADIO Iteration 17294534 .
shannon_rutherford She 's saying .. """" Please """" . She 's saying , """" Please help me . Please , come get me . """" .
james_ford Or she 's not ! You do n't even speak French !
kate_austen Let her listen !
boone_carlyle Shut up , man !
charlie_pace Guys , the battery . The battery .
RADIO Iteration 17294535 .
shannon_rutherford I 'm alone now . Uhm ... On the Island alone . Please , someone come . The others , they 're ... they 're dead . I - it killed them . I - it killed them all .
boone_carlyle That was good .
sayid_jarrah Sixteen years .
james_ford What ?
sayid_jarrah Sixteen years . And five months . That 's the count .
boone_carlyle What the hell are you talking about ?
sayid_jarrah The iterations . It 's a distress call . A plea for help . A mayday . If the count is right ... It 's been playing over ... and over ... for sixteen years .
boone_carlyle Someone else ? Was stranded here ?
kate_austen Maybe they came for them .
james_ford If someone came , why is it still playing ?
charlie_pace Guys . Where are we ?
